messages.body: $CIG I can tell you, my friends, is that when I sold CRBP way back when it was 7.50 or so, I bought Brazilian utilities which were grossly undervalued with nice dividends once a year. One that is in your ballpark price is $CIG, which yields 12.2% @ 1.99. There are others at much higher prices, but are similarly grossly undervalued and won't rebound until after the vaccine. Here they are so you can follow: $ELP, $SBS, $EBR, $VIV. Water, electric, energy, telephone, etc. These require you to wait a year or maybe less depending on the vaccine, while earning interest. GLTA. PS: I own 10,300 shares of CIG and 2-3000 of the others.

links.title: Centrais Electricas Brasileiras (EBR) - Revenue
links.description: According to Centrais Electricas Brasileiras's latest financial reports the company's current revenue (TTM) is $2.35 B. In 2019 the company made a revenue of$4.95 B.The revenue is the total amount of income that a company generates by the sale of goods or services. Unlike with the earnings no expences are substracted.
